post.title: CodeDom Grammar
post.content: I got a pointer to Mondrain off the Dotnet-sscli mailing list yesterday. Mondrain is one of a fewfunctionallanguages implementations for .NET. There’s also some interesting study of CodeDom, including a formal description of the grammar. Just the thing for building Disruptive Programming Language Technologies.
